Club Raro Resort Club Raro, adults only 18 + years resort, is located oceanfront with spectacular views over a coral beach, and is only five minutes' drive from Avarua town. The 78 air-conditioned rooms with fridges, safes, complimentary toiletries, and furnished balconies provide a range of affordable three star accommodation. Jalapeños a la carte restaurant offers alfresco dining on an expansive deck under the shade of coconut trees. Club Raro's famous cocktails are available at the swim up pool bar, the Sand Bar or in the lobby at the Club Bar. Happy Hours are from 11am to midday and 4-6pm daily. Club Raro appeals to a wide range of adults including young guests wanting to enjoy the lively night life of Avarua, soft adventurers looking for a base to explore Rarotonga with its many activities, business people, and singles and couples of all ages looking for a friendly boutique experience, good food and spectacular views.
